website_summaries.verdict: Number 1 small, stainless steel can for bathrooms, offices, and bedrooms.
pros: Reviewers love that it's a little larger than the typical bathroom trash can, so you have to empty it less often
cons: Some say the can arrived with dents, but the exchange and refund process was easy

website_summaries.verdict: High-quality, 12-liter can that is the most affordable option.
pros: Stainless-steel design stays clean and won't rust
Interior plastic pale is removable for easy cleaning and sanitizing
Stainless-steel exterior is easy to clean
cons: Smaller size is not suitable for your main kitchen trash can

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen trash can.
customer_reviews.text: About the size of a TJ bag, and about as big as you can get before plastic grocery store bags wont fit anymore. Works perfectly and hides the bag well (i'm using grocery store bags), doesn't tip over when you push the pedal, and has a nice rubber band mechanism to keep the bag in place. Really like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Dalbon

customer_reviews.title: It’s just OK
customer_reviews.text: It is probably too late, but I should have returned this once I realized it has some major faults. The lid dies not soft close as advertised. There is no bottom to it so that doesn’t help with keeping smells in and you can’t put extra bags in the bottom. Also, there is a neat feature to hold the bag in place. The problem is that it is only on one side so it barely helps at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking trash can. Good size for a larger bathroom or bedroom trash can. The lid seals perfectly and therefore contains smell well.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good little trash can
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because we have a Pocket Pit Bull who likes to steal tissues out of thrash and we needed something to keep her out of the trash. This works great. Also love the fact that it is slightly larger than most trash cans so it needs emptying less often.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Not much else I can say, but wish I had this at my desk a long time ago. I do recommend getting 4 gallon or 5 gallon trash bags (I am currently using 3.2 gallon trash bag, only because I have like 100 of them LOL).
customer_reviews.author: JJ UB

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. It's much less expensive than others of the size. Only minor negative is that the lid is not dampened, so it closes with a bit of a clang. Still a great value and good looking. Perfect size for a bathroom or home office (unless you generate a lot of paper!)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schlicher

customer_reviews.title: Great under the sink  size
customer_reviews.text: Needed a smaller under the sink lidded trash bin. This one is perfect. Takes a smaller bag that’s the perfect size for apartment trash chutes....plus I don’t like trash sitting around accumulating until a larger bag is filled.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The can does not stay open as the ad said it would. This did not work from day 1. Standard tall kitchen trash bags do not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customert

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is great. Looks nice and opens easily. I use it in our downstairs lavatory and it hasn't rusted like some of the cheaper cans I've used in the past. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can!!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is the perfect size for any bathroom. The capacity it can hold is just right. For my family of three, we only need to remove the trash twice a week at the most. I really like the stainless steel stylish appearance!
customer_reviews.author: anointed2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Totally recomended!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material and mechanism, easy to clean, no stains. Have been using this for over a year now and it looks brand new. I would definitely buy it again! Totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this, i was looking for a small can that was larger than the one I had. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfies our needs. Fits in the space, works as advertised, looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Buy this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can overall. Looks nice and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Petersime

customer_reviews.title: We use for a diaper pail, works great
customer_reviews.text: Work great as a diaper pail. Kick open is functional. Doesn't seal in smell from baby poopies, but we change it out every day.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is a perfect size for a bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is a perfect size for a bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Patt Norling

customer_reviews.title: Nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Trash can is nice looking and sturdy. The reason for 3 stars is that we received it with a dent in the front. I do not wish to send it back, so we are using it as is.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: size and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the kitchen. It's neat,clean and contains any smell
customer_reviews.author: Romi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very functional. A bit pricey but you get what you pay for in this case.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: A great and nicely designed trash can at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: For what it's worth, I'm an experienced mechanical design engineer with three patents.
customer_reviews.author: Bob A.

customer_reviews.title: Not only for an office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trash can for my daughters nursery. I was looking for something small in size, her room isn’t very big and easy to use. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a nursery trash can. This is perfect. I empty it daily so we never have a stinky trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Well made, seals odors
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid, good size for dirty diapers, lever for opening lid easy to use, seals odors well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice for the bigger space between your toilet and wall.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I felt it is good but expensive for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Awesomekk

customer_reviews.title: As I expected, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I though ght it was taller, said it was for kitchen. Placed in bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use with t-shirt bags
customer_reviews.text: The inner basket has two holes near the top, and they let you tuck in the extra from a liner e.g. a standard sized T-shirt shopping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hunting for. It is used as a trash can in the kitchen. I have had mouse problems. This does the job due to having a cover which is easy to use. The mice have moved elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Style and ease in use. Both fulfilled nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Like the entire waste can. Putting it on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Dent on the lid
customer_reviews.text: The stainless is a good quality and is a perfect size for my kitchen. However, I am so diappointed that there is a dent on the lid.

customer_reviews.title: No easy close
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and doesnt have easy close. We ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Richa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized and decent packaging.
customer_reviews.text: It had dents on the lid, but it's a trash bin so it doesn't matter too much.
customer_reviews.author: Censer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived All dinged up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but it’s design makes it vulnerable to damage during shipping. My trash can arrived all dinged up. I’m torn between returning it or just keeping it
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kimchi

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy and only have to make trashcan runs every 1
customer_reviews.text: I use this trash can for my kitty litter. Keeps most of the yucky smells in and very durable and aesthetically pleasing! I'm happy and only have to make trashcan runs every 1.5-2 weeks now! The cats are happier, and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: it’s an ok garbage. holds onto odors for to long so it ...
customer_reviews.text: it’s an ok garbage. holds onto odors for to long so it will do for short period of time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You must have this product!
customer_reviews.text: These cans are the perfect size, not too small not too large. The step mechanism works perfectly without any snags. The bags fit in the can with a non-slip clip in the back. And they also look pretty sharp in the bathroom. We bought two of them and are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: RMay09

customer_reviews.title: The product is nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixed review for this product. The product is nice and easy to use. Also fits exactly to my requirement. However when i received the same, it already had a dent. Returning was a pain so i ended up using it anyway. I wish I didnt have to use a defective product for the money i paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rai Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: We Like It
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have this new covered trash can in our travel trailer. No smells and the dog isn't getting in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: AZamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 gal size, nice quality !
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I purchased two, one for my business bathroom and one for my home bathroom. It is the 4gal size, and is just perfect. Many like this one is only 2 gal, but this size is idea, not too large for a small bathroom and not too large. Nice quality, not a top of the line quality, but a basic quality and foot press works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dymek

customer_reviews.title: Great size for our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works silently and is just large enough not to drive me crazy. Had a smaller one that felt like it needed to be empty every other day.
customer_reviews.author: UniqueFlips

customer_reviews.title: works great. Couldn't fine this size in any local stores
customer_reviews.text: Bought for diapers in nursery, works great. Couldn't fine this size in any local stores
customer_reviews.author: IY

customer_reviews.title: Unusual size for step-on garbage can - great for bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: This size step-on garbage can was extremely hard to find. I wanted it for the bathroom -- most step-on cans for the bathroom are tiny and would require emptying way too often. Also, a short, tiny can is a more difficult target for garbage. This is the perfect size. Easy to empty. Easy to rinse out. I don't bother with a liner/bag, although there's a good fastener for the bag included. The quality could be a bit better though.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but usable
customer_reviews.text: I like this trash can and it’s good for the price. I bought it on amazon knowing the original packaging was damaged at a discounted rate. But the trash can itself was also damaged, I guess, as there is discoloration/peeling along the lid. It’ll serve its intended purpose, but won’t do so as pretty as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Search continues
customer_reviews.text: This is nearly perfect but has a giant flaw. The lid does not close. This is frustrating for me as I have to manually close it every time and it just get's annoying to bend down and do that. I'm hoping its just the item that was sent to me was damaged. If not, for the price, I think it would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Meera

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this to put sanitary pads in, near a portable pot. This prevents odors from getting out and emptying it is easy because of the plastic pail that easily lifts out. The foot pedal lifts the lid and both hands are free to deposit the refuse into it or taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Closes nice and tight, bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: neat stainless steel finish, closes snug enough to keep out the creepy crawlies. Holds bags easily without rubber bands (the lip has a rim that presses against the can, gripping the bag) Making the lid stay up took a few tries but it works. Have not cleaned it yet but will be easy with teh removable bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Dell Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Best home garbage can I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Home Zone Stainless Steel Kitchen Trash can with Step-Lid is quality sleekness. Stepper seems durable. Nice liner basket inside. The best home garbage can I ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: To work correctly
customer_reviews.text: I love the pail itself but the lid does not stay up when I put my foot on the pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size trash bin. Not so large and not too small. Easy to use. Sturdy. Looks good! Great for the price too
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Step On Lid
customer_reviews.text: I use this covered trashcan in my bathroom to keep my dog from going in it. My previous trash can was open and it created a mess. This sleek trashcan looks great and hides unsightly bathroom garbage.
customer_reviews.author: sk94

customer_reviews.title: Quality, durability & value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Great price. I purchased TWO, one for each bathroom for our family of five. I spray painted one (as pictured) to match the bathroom decorum (brown/bronze). Perfect size for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Jst4Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to put in my bathrooms. I bought one to see if I liked it and then ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: S. JACOBS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, stainless steel garbage can. It works great, looks great , for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Marykate

customer_reviews.title: Trash can that cats can't get into!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for the bathroom. My cats used to tip over the can and play in the trash and scoot it all over the floor. Now they don't even bother the can at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I keep this next to my cat's litter box. The Hefty 4 gallon trash bags fit in it perfectly and when full it's very easy to tie the bag and take it to the trash can using the removable insert.
customer_reviews.author: miss marple

customer_reviews.title: Good darn trash can who need a better trash experiance!
customer_reviews.text: Well it is sturdy, pretty, and works as intended. Wish it was cheaper though.

customer_reviews.title: We bought this so the cat would get on the trash.... it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking trash bin. Great value for the price. We bought it to prevent the cat to go in the trash... It worked!

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a bathroom, wouldn't use it in the kitchen.. looks good,

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size for a 1
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is sturdy and solid. It does not move when stepped on to open.
customer_reviews.author: Ateca Cavu

customer_reviews.title: Not a trashy trash can
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a few of these now bc they are sturdy and look nice. One of them arrived damaged and the seller took care of the problem with no hassles. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the space in our bathroom and I love the stainless steel look.

customer_reviews.title: Not dog proof
customer_reviews.text: Well made but the dog figured it out on day 1

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Good removable liner. Bought to be used as diaper pail, to be emptied prequently.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little trash can. It doesn't feel cheap or lightweight but feels like it is made to last. The pedal especially is not as flimsy as some other trash cans I've had I like it so much that I'm going to buy the larger 13-gallon version for my kitchen even though the cheaper one that I have in there now is still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: TalNewRoc

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The can is very attractive and the shape is good to put against a flat surface. I was unable to get the lid to stay up without using my hands however. The instructions are confusing. The instructions mentions pushing, but does that mean it has to be done with your hands or is there a way to keep the lid up without using your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and seems sturdy. The lid comes down automatically when you take your foot off the pedal. But a bit of a jiggle of the top will keep it up if you want it so. Takes medium size (8 gallon) garbage bags but may empty more easily with the slightly larger tall kitchen (13 gallon) size.
customer_reviews.author: Carneades

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice can but lid won't stay open
customer_reviews.text: Nice-Looking can and good quality but can't get the lid to stay open by following the instructions inside the lid. ):-(

customer_reviews.title: Good diaper pail.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a diaper pail for my grandchildren’s visits. It works well and is the right size for my purpose.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for keeping odors in and pets out.
customer_reviews.text: this is a good, heavier trash can than the other one I purchased first. It closes well and my dogs can't get in it. I really like this one. It takes 4 gallon trash bags.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Shop
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a shop trash can, especially for stogie butts, as it keeps a lid on the odor.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. They are mid-sized
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. They are mid-sized, about 4 gallons. We are using them in our office restrooms. They look great, work great.

customer_reviews.title: I wish they were more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one of them fell off by accident and it got a really big dent. I wish they were more sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: It's a trashcan
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It's irritating to me that the right size trash can won't fit into it.

product_meta.title: Home Zone Stainless Steel Kitchen Trash Can with Oval Design and Step Pedal | 12 Liter / 3 Gallon Storage with Removable Plastic Trash Bin Liner, Silver
product_meta.description: The HomeZone VA40913A 12-Liter Stainless Steel Oval Step Trash Can is the perfect way to store trash in your bathroom, office or elsewhere in your home. This trash can holds up to 12-liters, and uses 4-gallon trash bags. The durable pedal design and the stay-open lid makes it easy to lift the lid without using your hands. The stainless steel body of the can resists fingerprints, preserving the clean, stylish look. There is a removable plastic pail to make cleaning and taking out the trash simple, and the rubber band holds the bag in place for a clean look. The HomeZone VA40913A 12-Liter Stainless Steel Oval Step Trash Can measures 11.42-inches long, 16.46-inches tall, and 11.61-inches wide. HomeZone products are both stylish and functional, allowing you to make the most out of every space in your home.
feature_bullets: ✅ PERFECT SOLUTION - Store trash, rubbish and waste in your bathroom, office, or elsewhere in your home. The alluring design makes for a great addition to any room or outdoor patio
🗑️ STAINLESS STEEL BODY - Protects against corrosion, rust, finger prints and bacteria growth. Preserving the clean and stylish appearance
✋ HANDS-FREE - Sturdy and sleek pedal design with a stay-open lid makes for convenient disposal
🧽 SIMPLE TO CLEAN - Very low maintenance makes cleaning easy and minimal, creating a fresh environment
💪 DURABLE - Capable of holding up to 12-liters of waste and uses 4-gallon trash bags
📏 DIMENSIONS - 11.42" L x 11.61" W x 16.46" H
✨ POLISHED DESIGN - High-quality stainless steel material along with a removable plastic liner and rubber band to hold bag in place

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars215 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
